answers.author: Chris Fabian
answers.text:
Hello Roy-
Thanks for inquiring about the fiscal health and priority based budgeting tools highlighted during our recent "New Wave" of local government conference. The best place to start investigating the power of these scalable and replicable tools is our website at www.pbbcenter.org. We also offer free webinars where we can provide background on our work, learn more about your community and demonstrate exactly how these tools work. Feel free to contact me directly at efabian@pbbcenter.org or by phone at 503.866.4580.
